Class DGStatusHandle

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--DGStatusHandle
public class DGStatusHandle
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles different status types and their effect on characters. Like DGTypeHandle, this is a completely static class.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment

Method Detail

Act

public static boolean Act(int status,
                          DGCharacter inflicted)
Does stuff to the character based on status inflicted. Returns whether or not character is allowed to have a turn.
Parameters:
status - Status inflicted (use public constants)
inflicted - DGCharacter inflicted with said status
Returns:
If inflicted can have a turn
